item.title: How to Compile Nginx With Source Code
item.author: echo.wings@gmail.com (echowings)
item.description: How to compile nginx with source code Download source code Access nginx.org to download latest stable version of nginx. 1 2 wget https://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.16.0.tar.gz tar -zxvf nginx-1.16.0.tar.gz Compile source code 1 2 3 4 5 cd nginx-1.16.0 apt update && apt install -y gcc build-essential ./configure --prefix=/home/echowings/nginx make make install Trouble shooting PCRE missing error. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 .
